pkgmetadata.longdescription: # MangoWGMango Website Generator PyPi Package ## Python Venv* `python -m venv venv`* `venv\Scripts\activate.bat`* `pip install -r requirements.txt`* `pip freeze > requirements.txt`## UsageGet started `python mangowg.py --help`To use command selection rather than typing the command name, use `python mangowg.py cut` then select the command to be executed.Run the commands in order```start > new > updateWholeProfile > getGithubInfo > getRepos > selectRepos > updateTemplate > push ```## PyPi publish Publish new package* install poetry* `poetry init`* `poetry build`* `poetry publish -u USERNAME -p PASSWORD` * use pypi password for this stepTo update version number:* `poetry version 0.1.2`* `poetry build`* `poetry publish -u USERNAME -p PASSWORD` * use github password for this step
